description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter application called NotesApp. It initializes necessary dependencies, sets up providers, loads environment variables, and launches the main app widget.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that builds the root of the app with theming and home screen.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes environment, database, and dependency injection containers for the app, then runs the main application widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the NotesApp widget, returning a MaterialApp configured with theme and home screen.
